# 📊 Market Intel — Feb 15, 2026 | 2:00 AM ET

**Top Stories: X launching crypto/stock trading • Bitcoin claws back to $70K • Gold smashes $5,000 • Rivian surges on analyst upgrades • Trump's Truth Social files for crypto ETFs**

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **Elon's X launching in-app crypto & stock trading "in a couple weeks"** — users will interact with ticker symbols in posts and execute trades within the app. Massive if real. Could disrupt Robinhood/Coinbase.
- **Bitcoin recovers to $70,000** after $8.7B wipeout — cooling inflation data helped, but Fear & Greed Index still at "extreme fear"
- **Gold hits $5,046/oz (+2.0%)** — record territory continues. Silver ripping too at $78 (+3.0%)
- **Trump-linked Truth Social seeking SEC approval for two crypto ETFs** — BTC/ETH fund + staking-focused Cronos fund
- **Renaissance Technologies loading up on NFLX, LRCX, NOW** — smart money signals sector rotation

## 🚀 Tesla / SpaceX / Elon

- **TSLA $417.44** (+0.09%) — trading flat, 52-week range $214-$499
- **X trading platform imminent** — in-app crypto and stock trading launching within weeks. This is the "everything app" play Musk has been building toward
- **Tesla narrative shifting** — Yahoo Scout notes Tesla "navigating pivotal transformation" toward AI, robotics, energy. New $25K Cybercab coming but production expected slow
- **PE ratio at 383x** — still priced for massive future growth
- Earnings expected Apr 21, 2026

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

- **BTC ~$70,000** — bounced back from $8.7B wipeout. Extreme fear persists
- **GENIUS Act ripple effect** — institutional demand for crypto "never been higher" per Sui execs
- **Truth Social crypto ETFs** — filed with SEC for BTC/ETH fund + Cronos staking fund
- **Coinbase** — Wall Street slashing price targets after Q4 miss, but shares rallied anyway
- **Stablecoin battle** — Wall Street bankers want total ban on stablecoin yield; crypto lobby pushing back with own principles at White House
- **Galaxy Digital** sees "great convergence" driving long-term crypto outlook despite recent selloff

## 🏈 Sports & Betting

- **NBA All-Star Weekend** — Sunday showcase, watch for prop bets and player performance markets
- **Presidents' Day weekend** — markets closed Monday, light volume expected. Sports betting volume typically elevated on long weekends
- No major NFL action (offseason), but NBA and college basketball in full swing

- **Gold $5,046** (+2.0%) — absolutely ripping, safe haven demand + weak dollar

- **Trump tariff signals** — potential reduction in steel/aluminum tariffs creating uncertainty

- **X as a trading platform** is THE story — Musk turning X into a financial super-app
